translations: 非法占有；取回被人非法占有动产之诉讼

sentences.sentence: This article discusses its concept, meaning of detinue, functionand, cognizance and helpless calling-up thus brings forward new ideas and solves pendent problems.
sentences.translation: 本文通过对恶意透支的概念，非法占有目的的含义、功能、认定，催收不还的界定的具体理解的论述，提出许多新的观点，解决了许多悬而未决的问题。
